posts.post_content:
THIS CARD HAS BEEN TRADED  :)


Hi,
I have a decent looking Huggins Type 2 Coupon that I would like to trade.

I am looking to trade for another Type 2.  Maybe a couple of beater commons?  Graded or ungraded.  Or a beater Holsum plus some cash from me, or Weil Baking.  Pretty much anything made in Louisiana and condition is not an issue unless it is really nasty.

I love to trade so feel free to see if we can work something out.

Thanks, Rick
